definitions.definition: Removing or separating from some association .
examples: It was a lonely, dissociative time in my life, when I stayed holed up in my apartment for weeks on end.
The dissociative techniques separated ammonium chloride into hydrochloric acid and ammonia.

definitions.definition: Related to or caused by dissociation or dissociative disorders .
examples: He had to take a few weeks off school after a dissociative episode.

main_definition: Removing or separating from some association .
secondary_definitions: ( psychology ) Related to or caused by dissociation or dissociative disorders .
